Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Cowra, Econo Lodge Alabaster is convenient to Cowra Regional Art Gallery and Cowra Golf Club. This motel is within close proximity of Cowra Rose Garden.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 16 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Plasma televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and barbecue grills.

Dining
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

Located in Cowra, Econo Lodge Alabaster is convenient to Cowra Regional Art Gallery and Cowra Golf Club. This motel is within close proximity of Cowra Rose Garden.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cowra Regional Art Gallery - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Cowra Golf Club - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Cowra Rose Garden - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for Econo Lodge Alabaster is Orange, NSW (OAG) - 63.8 km / 39.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
